brief.content-text:
The animation depicts V LAN interaction. Two switches are connected together.

Client H1 on V LAN 2 says, I have to send a message to H3. It then sends the message to H3, also on V LAN 2.

H1 on V LAN 2 says, I have to send a message to H6. H6 is on V LAN 3.

H1 and H6 are unable to communicate because they are on different V LAN's. Traffic cannot move between V LAN's without the assistance of a router.
